#summary A brief introduction to Maxtable Query Language (MQL)

MQL is based on the style of traditional relational query language.
  * *CREATE TABLE*.....create table table_name (column1 type1, ...,cloumnx type x) 
  * *INSERT*....................insert into table_name (column1_value,...columnx_value)
  * *DELETE*..................delete table_name (column1_value)
  * *SELECT*..................select table_name (column1_value)
  * *SELECTRANGE*......selectrange table_name (column1_value1, column1_value2)
  * *SELECTWHERE*......selectwhere table_name where columnX_name(columnX_value1, columnX_value2) and columnY_name(columnY_value1, columnY_value2)
  * *DROP*.....................drop table_name

*Examples*
  * create table that stores the file metadata.
{{{
create table metabase (filename varchar, filesize int, serveraddr varchar)
return: success or fail
}}}
  * insert data
{{{
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt, 16000, 192.168.1.152)
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/bsheng.txt, 1600, 192.168.1.152)
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/paul.txt, 17000, 192.168.1.152)
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/jeff.txt, 18000, 192.168.1.152)
insert into metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/brian.txt, 1000, 192.168.1.152)
return: success or fail
}}}
  * select data by the default key column
{{{
select metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt)
return: 
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt, 16000, 192.168.1.152
}}}
  * select data by the range user specified
{{{
selectrange metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/bsheng.txt, /home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/jeff.txt)
return:
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/bsheng.txt, 1600, 192.168.1.152
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/brian.txt, 1000, 192.168.1.152
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/jeff.txt, 18000, 192.168.1.152
}}}
  * select data by the WHERE clause
{{{
selectwhere metebase where filename(*, *) AND filesize(16500, 20000)
return:
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/paul.txt, 17000, 192.168.1.152
/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/jeff.txt, 18000, 192.168.1.152
}}}
  * delete data
{{{
delete metabase (/home/tnsoft/yxue/maxtable/victory.txt)
return: success or fail
}}}
  * drop table
{{{
drop metabase
return: success or fail
}}}
